column2:
"...Good work.
I think that was a great exploration
we had."

"...we were also able to enjoy the
beautiful seabed scenery.
..I also think that we have grown more."

"...I have a feeling that we will have
more chances for future explorations
together."

"...do give me a hand again when that
happens, ok?
Alright, I'll take my leave now, bye."

"……お疲れ様。
素晴らしい探索が出来た、と思う。"

"……それでいて海底の美しさを
味わう余裕も持てた。
……我ながら成長した、と思う。"

"……貴方とはまた一緒に探索する機会を
持てそうな気がする。"

"……その時は、よろしくね。
それじゃ、私はこれで。"
